p: Versatile and driven Software Engineer with a strong background in full stack development, data analytics, and clinical software solutions. Proven experience in modernizing legacy systems, driving integration with third-party platforms, and contributing to scalable enterprise applications. Highly collaborative team player with experience in Agile environments and a passion for solving real-world problems through code.
Graduated from UMass Amherst, with a B.S. in Mathematics. Earned a Full Stack Web Development certificate from University of New Hampshire in 2021.
Currently employed with Bonterra Tech as a Full Stack Software Engineer.
